translation.name: Avtandil Makhatadze
translation.hero_description: I create modern and responsive web applications with a focus on high quality and user-centric design.
translation.about_bio: I am a skilled Front-End Developer with 5+ years of experience in the web technology field. My main focus is creating interactive and dynamic interfaces based on React. I constantly learn new technologies and strive to make my work as efficient, fast, and visually polished as possible. In my free time, I enjoy working on new projects and deepening my knowledge.
